Articles.Content: I have been trying to make an F-16 for awhile now and I have a nice looking cockpit from the airplaneplus mod but I cannot find a nice looking rear section for the plane. I was looking at F-16s that people had made and I found this https://m.imgur.com/t/gaming/gYNLO. Does anyone know where these parts came from?
I made a F-16 also and I used the same technique as in the picture. That's the ECM pod from the BD Armory mod.

1 hour ago, Midnight Jade said:

I made a F-16 also and I used the same technique as in the picture. That's the ECM pod from the BD Armory mod.

Oh that’s cool. But my main issues is the air brakes. I didn’t release that those pictures didn’t include the one I wanted.

Oh, yea, ok, I can't see the air breaks in those pictures.

Well this is how I made mine, maybe it will give you inspiration:

https://imgur.com/a/pZw5p

Mods used are B9 procedural wings for the control surfaces and MK2 Expansion for the chines.

The airbrakes activate by action group.

 

 

Edited March 14, 2018 by Midnight Jade

44 minutes ago, Midnight Jade said:

Oh, yea, ok, I can't see the air breaks in those pictures.

Well this is how I made mine, maybe it will give you inspiration:

https://imgur.com/a/pZw5p

Mods used are B9 procedural wings for the control surfaces and MK2 Expansion for the chines.

The airbrakes activate by action group.

 

 

That makes perfect sense. I don’t know how I didn’t think of that sooner. Thank you so much!
